reviewText: I have been searching for this movie for over 20 years.i just could not remember the name of it.this story is my story. Only I am the sister who was searching for my 2 brothers, we were all separated as children. I want my husband to watch it with me when I receive it. This movie is so close to home for me. This movie is my favorite movie ever.my husband has said to me that I should write a book about my life. I tell him they already made a movie of most of it:)  this is a must see movie.... I loved it. Can not wait to receive it. Hope you enjoy it as much as I did.....love is all you need :). Thank you amazon my search is over.  Love from diana:)

this item arrived way in advance than what was expected.i arrived in about 3 days after ordering. I strongly recommend the seller and hope they continue to offer great products and the same speedy delivery.

I love this movie. I have been looking  for this about 20 years. The first time I saw it was on a TV special and I never forgot the story.
I still cry when watching.
This movie was wonderful!  I watched it on an after school special as a kid and it has always stayed with me.  Still as moving.  Thanks for having this film.
very good movie. I remember watching this movie on tv back in 1981. cant belive i found it
One of my favorite old movies
I had tried looking for this movie for a long time. I'm so glad I finally found it. this is one of Timothy Hutton's earlier movies. It was great. I think anyone that would see this would enjoy it.

Triple Feature (Stolen from the Heart (2000) / Switching Parents (1993) / A Long Way Home (1981)) ASIN: B003WVNGVY B003WVNGVY get all 3 movies for allot less money then these selelrs are wanting for just the one movie. it is rare but who is paying $100 on up for this???

I loved this movie and I have been looking for it for years.  I think a scene was deleted from the original.  At the beginning of the movie I remember Donald was taking his siblings to the playground after dark and pushing them on the swings.  I am so happy to have this movie on DVD.  Every time I watch it I am just as moved as the first time I saw it.
This movie was one of my favorites & it's very emotional to see what kids go through when they are in foster care or with the adoption agencies...very touching

This is a very touchy movie.  It is so sad to watch the 3 very mis-fortunate children growing up with pain and separation. A handkerchief is surely needed during the movie.  I watched this movie repeatedly on TV during the early 80', and had been looking for this movie for so many years.  I finally own a copy. It is a great collection to keep.
So glad I found this classic tv movie that touched me when i was young!! It brought tears to my eyes once again! This also was a great deal with prompt delivery!!

I saw the last part of this movie on TV way back in about the mid 1980s.  I've been wanting it every since.  I just received the DVD of it today.  I've waited around 25 years to finally get a copy of this movie.  I just finished watching the whole thing.  I love it!  It's a very touching and inspiring movie!  I love that heart-warming ending!  :)

This film was shown on T.V. some time ago-a marvellous film-WHY OH WHY has nobody in the UK had the initiative to make it available on DVD which can be played and watched at a reasonable price-the one shown on TV starred Timothy Hutton and Rosanna Arquette-Help!
